snippet.title: Galbia Tales - Official Trailer [Demo Version] || iOS & Android
snippet.description:
Galbia Tales is a spin off of "La Leggenda Dell'Ultimo Drago" game. 
It is a frenetic runner game full of action and exploration developed by Luca Modaudo (Zef1r0) & Andrea Santangelo (gh-software).
The game will be available for iOS & Android.

Follow the brave swordsman of Galbia kingdom to the search of the missing daughter in 15 different game levels, you'll know a world full of mysteries and magic.

Fight hordes of monsters, demons and find the right way to defeat seemingly invincible creatures.

Collect coins and gems to get  powerful equipment. 

Don't forget, the time will be your biggest enemy.


Try for free the first level of the game  : 

https://zef1r0.itch.io/galbia-tales


** Coming in 2020 **
